titles.title: Higher Education Transparency Act of 2021
To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to require the disclosure of agreements between institutions of higher education and certain foreign sources, and for other purposes.
Higher Education Transparency Act of 2021

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
Higher Education Transparency Act of 2021
This bill requires an institution of higher education (IHE) that participates in federal student-aid programs to make available on its website the full content of any agreement between the IHE and a foreign source that provides language and cultural teaching resources and services to its students.
